title: Most Successful Champ
body:
Hey,

I was just wondering which champs people have had the most success on in ranked, with a minimum of 20 games played on the champ

replies.body:
Irelia for sure, last season i played 24 games with her and had a 70% win rate with her, this season iv played 65 games with her and iv got a 60% win rate with her, it's really easy to carry yourself and your team with Irelia as she's a really safe/ strong top lane pick, not many champions counter her effectively and those who do aren't played much anymore.

But i would also recommend Shyvana and Evelynn jungle, Shyvana at the moment is considered somewhat of a hyper carry with her ridiculously high damage output (Full Stack Devour + BOTRK = GG you can't out trade me) and Evelynn is every opposing laners worst nightmare, if your team is decent you can win games no problem with her.

Ive only recently started playing rank again after 2 season off. Shyvana has been working well for me i think I've got 19-5 W/L ratio. That'll probably change once i get to a higher division though. I build devourer, botrk, then go all tank.

Xin Zhao {{champion:5}} has had a decent win rate. During the fact he only needs {{item:3930}} and full tank ({{item:3110}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3083}} ) to even kill the game. He barley dies unless he is caught out...
